input_text:
Job Title: Facility Maintenance Coordinator

Location: Kent, WA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Position: Facility Maintenance Coordinator

Location: Auburn, WA

Pay: $23/hr to $27/hr, depending on experience

Experience: Previous manufacturing experience required; Fiber Optic and Copper manufacturing experience desired

Education: N/A

Type: Full-time; Temp to Perm; When hired full-time, associates are eligible to receive health benefits, 401k match of 4%, and bonuses!

Schedule: Day Shift

Logic Staffing is seeking a Facility Maintenance Coordinator to join a growing and dynamic team!

Job Description:

Provide daily maintenance support for production equipment including preventive maintenance, troubleshooting, and repair/rebuild of equipment.Identify the root causes of machine failures and promptly address them.Maintain and upgrade equipment documentation, particularly electrical.Register inspection results into appropriate forms and QAPV software.Work with CI and Process Engineer to keep defect catalog updated by communicating new issues found.Support in enhancing the efficiency of manufacturing assemblers by reporting nonconformity issues.Ensure manufacturing documentation and data are correct by checking shop traveler, drawings, and database.Perform audits of production processes, finished products, and work-in-process.Create and deliver PPM reports based on defects.Participate in problem-solving meetings.

Position Requirements:

Microsoft Office proficiencyStrong math skills; Ability to perform unit conversionsAbility to occasionally lift up 25-50 pounds

Logic Staffing does not just connect you with a job; we offer a Professional Mentoring & Education Program to help you be great at your job, love it, and grow. This is not an elevator to success; it is a ladder, and you must put in the work to climb so youâ€™ll never feel stuck in a dead-end job again.

Logic Staffing is part of Array Corporation, the leading technology-enabled workforce solutions company whose mission is to fix how labor is bought, sold and delivered to enable universal access to the American Dream.

We are proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Facility Maintenance Coordinator
output_json.summary:
Position: Facility Maintenance Coordinator
Location: Auburn, WA
Employment Type: full-time
Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing
job_responsibilities: Provide daily maintenance support for production equipment including preventive maintenance, troubleshooting, and repair/rebuild of equipment.
Identify the root causes of machine failures and promptly address them.
Maintain and upgrade equipment documentation, particularly electrical.
Register inspection results into appropriate forms and QAPV software.
Work with CI and Process Engineer to keep defect catalog updated by communicating new issues found.
Support in enhancing the efficiency of manufacturing assemblers by reporting nonconformity issues.
Ensure manufacturing documentation and data are correct by checking shop traveler, drawings, and database.
Perform audits of production processes, finished products, and work-in-process.
Create and deliver PPM reports based on defects.
output_json.company_information: Logic Staffing is part of Array Corporation, the leading technology-enabled workforce solutions company whose mission is to fix how labor is bought, sold and delivered to enable universal access to the American Dream.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: We are proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status.
